name: Quiet Please
description:
Created by Ben Silver, Elliot Pope, Mitchel Taylor and Stephanie McGrory.

You are the librarian in a popular library, but a pesky boy band keep using the side rooms for practice and become too noisy.

To avoid being fired, you have to stack books and chase away the boy band before the noise level becomes too high.

How to Play:

  • An X-Box 360 controller is required to play this game.
  • Use the left thumbstick to move around and the right thumbstick to rotate the camera
  • Books are picked up and stacked on the shelf whenever you come into contact with them
  • Boy band is chased away by getting close to them
